General.Name: Creek Road Miners Inc
General.Description: Prairie Operating Co. engages in developing energy to meet growing demand, while protecting the environment. The company was formerly known as Creek Road Miners, Inc. and changed its name to Prairie Operating Co. in May 2023. Prairie Operating Co. is based in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.
General.Address: 2700 Homestead Road, Park City, UT, United States, 84098
